options.name: Create Spreadsheet
options.action: Create Spreadsheet Docs Sheets Spreadsheet
options.description: Use this API to create an online spreadsheet under the specified directory. API reference documentation: [Create spreadsheet]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet/create)

options.name: Obtain Filter
options.action: Obtain Filter Docs Sheets Sheet Filter
options.description: This API is used to obtain the filter details for a sheet. API reference documentation: [Obtain filter]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter/get)

options.name: Create A Filter
options.action: Create A Filter Docs Sheets Sheet Filter
options.description: ::: note For parameter values, see [Filter guide]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter/filter-user-guide) ::: This API is used to create a filter in a sheet. API reference documentation: [Create a filter]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter/create)

options.name: Update A Filter
options.action: Update A Filter Docs Sheets Sheet Filter
options.description: ::: note For parameter values, see [Filter guide]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter/filter-user-guide) ::: This API is used to update column filter conditions in the sheet range. API reference documentation: [Update a filter]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter/update)

options.name: Delete A Filter
options.action: Delete A Filter Docs Sheets Sheet Filter
options.description: This API is used to delete the filter of a sheet. API reference documentation: [Delete a filter]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter/delete)

options.name: Delete Filter View
options.action: Delete Filter View Docs Sheets Sheet Filter View
options.description: This API is used to delete the filter view corresponding to the specified ID. API reference documentation: [Delete filter view]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view/delete)

options.name: Update Filter View
options.action: Update Filter View Docs Sheets Sheet Filter View
options.description: ::: note For range settings, see: [User guide for using filter conditions in the filter view]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view-condition/filter-view-condition-user-guide) ::: This API is used to update the filter view name or range. The name can't exceed 100 characters and must be unique within the sheet. The range can't exceed the maximum range of the sheet. API reference documentation: [Update filter view]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view/patch)

options.name: Obtain Filter View
options.action: Obtain Filter View Docs Sheets Sheet Filter View
options.description: This API is used to obtain the name and range of a specified filter view ID. API reference documentation: [Obtain filter view]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view/get)

options.name: Query Filter View
options.action: Query Filter View Docs Sheets Sheet Filter View
options.description: This API is used to query the basic information of all filter views in a sheet, including their IDs, names, and ranges. API reference documentation: [Query filter view]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view/query)

options.name: Create Filter View
options.action: Create Filter View Docs Sheets Sheet Filter View
options.description: ::: note For range settings, see: [User guide for using filter conditions in the filter view]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view-condition/filter-view-condition-user-guide) ::: This API is used to create a filter view based on passed in parameters. The ID and name fields are optional and default values are generated if none are provided. The range field is required. IDs are 10 characters long and composed of numbers and upper and lowercase English letters. Names can't exceed 100 characters. A single sheet can have up to 150 filter views. API reference documentation: [Create filter view]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view/create)

options.name: Delete Filter Conditions
options.action: Delete Filter Conditions Docs Sheets Filter Condition Filter View
options.description: This API is used to delete filter conditions for a specified column in the range of a filter view. API reference documentation: [Delete filter conditions]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view-condition/delete)

options.name: Update Filter Conditions
options.action: Update Filter Conditions Docs Sheets Filter Condition Filter View
options.description: ::: note For filter condition parameters, see [User guide for using filter conditions in the filter view]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view-condition/filter-view-condition-user-guide) ::: This API is used to update filter conditions for a column in the range of a filter view. The condition ID is the letter designation of the column. API reference documentation: [Update filter conditions]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view-condition/update)

options.name: Obtain Filter Conditions
options.action: Obtain Filter Conditions Docs Sheets Filter Condition Filter View
options.description: ::: note For filter condition explanations, see [User guide for using filter conditions in the filter view]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view-condition/filter-view-condition-user-guide) ::: This API is used to obtain the filter conditions of a specified column in the filter view. API reference documentation: [Obtain filter conditions]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view-condition/get)

options.name: Query Filter Conditions
options.action: Query Filter Conditions Docs Sheets Filter Condition Filter View
options.description: ::: note For filter condition explanations, see [User guide for using filter conditions in the filter view]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view-condition/filter-view-condition-user-guide) ::: This API is used to query all filter conditions of a filter view. All filter conditions in the range of the filter view are returned. API reference documentation: [Query filter conditions]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view-condition/query)

options.name: Create A Filter Condition
options.action: Create A Filter Condition Docs Sheets Filter Condition Filter View
options.description: ::: note For filter conditions, see [User guide for using filter conditions in the filter view]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view-condition/filter-view-condition-user-guide) ::: This API is used to create filter conditions for a column in the range of a filter view. API reference documentation: [Create a filter condition]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-filter_view-condition/create)

options.name: Rows Or Columns To Move
options.action: Rows Or Columns To Move Docs Sheets Sheet Row Column
options.description: This API is used to move rows and columns. After rows and columns are moved to a target location, the rows and columns already at the target location are shifted right or down. API reference documentation: [Rows or columns to move]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet/move_dimension)

options.name: Search
options.action: Search Docs Sheets Sheet Data
options.description: Search cell locations that match specified conditions in a certain range of the sheet. The range and find fields are required in the request body. API reference documentation: [Search]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet/find)

options.name: Replace
options.action: Replace Docs Sheets Sheet Data
options.description: Find data that matches specified conditions in a certain range of the sheet, replace the values, and return the location of the successfully replaced cell. You can replace up to 5,000 cells at a time. If the number of matching cells exceeds the limit, narrow the range before the action. The range, find, and replacement fields are required in the request body. API reference documentation: [Replace]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet/replace)

options.name: Create A Floating Image
options.action: Create A Floating Image Docs Sheets Sheet Floating Image
options.description: ::: note For information about the settings of a floating image, see [Floating image guide]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-float_image/float-image-user-guide). ::: This API is used to create a floating image based on the parameters passed in. Float_image_token ([obtained after uploading an image to a spreadsheet]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/media/upload_all)) and range (only one cell) are required parameters. Float_image_id is optional, and a default ID is generated if this field is not specified. IDs are 10 characters long and composed of numbers (0-9) and upper and lowercase English letters. A spreadsheet cannot have duplicate images, and the total of floating images and cell images cannot exceed 4,000. The width and height specify the display width and height of an image, which are optional. If not specified, the image is displayed according to its actual width and height. offset_x and offset_y specify the offset of the image from the top-left corner of the cell where it is located. These two parameters are optional and default to 0. API reference documentation: [Create a floating image]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-float_image/create)

options.name: Obtain A Floating Image
options.action: Obtain A Floating Image Docs Sheets Sheet Floating Image
options.description: ::: note For information about floating images, see [Floating image guide]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-float_image/float-image-user-guide) ::: This API is used to obtain floating image information based on a float_image_id. API reference documentation: [Obtain a floating image]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-float_image/get)

options.name: Update A Floating Image
options.action: Update A Floating Image Docs Sheets Sheet Floating Image
options.description: ::: note For information about how to update a floating image, see [Floating image guide]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-float_image/float-image-user-guide). ::: This API is used to update the position and size parameters of an existing floating image, including range, width, height, offset_x, and offset_y. This operation cannot update float_image_id or float_image_token. API reference documentation: [Update a floating image]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-float_image/patch)

options.name: Delete A Floating Image
options.action: Delete A Floating Image Docs Sheets Sheet Floating Image
options.description: This API is used to delete the floating image with the specified float_image_id. API reference documentation: [Delete a floating image]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-float_image/delete)

options.name: Query Floating Images
options.action: Query Floating Images Docs Sheets Sheet Floating Image
options.description: ::: note For information about floating images, see [Floating image guide]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-float_image/float-image-user-guide) ::: This API returns information on all floating images in a sheet. API reference documentation: [Query floating images]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uUDN04SN0QjL1QDN/sheets-v3/spreadsheet-sheet-float_image/query)

name: condition_id
description: Letter designation of a column in the range

name: condition_id
description: Letter designation of column for which to query filter conditions
